com.qtfx.lib.task

Class TaskRun

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinTask<java.lang.Void>
      • com.qtfx.lib.task.Task
        • com.qtfx.lib.task.TaskRun
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Void>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileScanner, SampleTaskRun

    public abstract class TaskRun
extends Task
    A task that runs in a task pool.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • parent

        private TaskPool parent
        The parent task pool.

      • indeterminate

        private boolean indeterminate
        A flag that forces the task to act indeterminate during notifications. If any task in the pool is indeterminate, any notification is managed by the parent task pool.

    • Constructor Detail

      • requestTotalWork

        protected abstract double requestTotalWork()
        Request the total work. Called by the parent pool.
        Returns:
        The total work.

      • update

        protected void update(java.lang.String message,
                      double workDone,
                      double totalWork)
        Updates the user message, the work done and total, the time and the progress messages.

        This method does nothing when the task is tagged as indeterminate by the parent pool.

        Overrides:
        update in class Task
        Parameters:
        message - The user message.
        workDone - The work done.
        totalWork - The total work.

      • updateCounting

        protected void updateCounting()
        Updates the progress message property with the token counting, useful for some tasks that spend some time counting the number of steps.

        This method does nothing when the task is tagged as indeterminate by the parent pool.

        Overrides:
        updateCounting in class Task

        This method does nothing when the task is tagged as indeterminate by the parent pool.

        Overrides:
        updateTimeMessage in class Task

      • updateProgress

        protected void updateProgress(double workDone,
                              double totalWork)
        Update the work done by incrementally updating the parent work done.

        When running in a parent pool, progress updates are managed incremental and submitted to the parent. Must block until done. A special case is when workDone and totalWork are -1.

        Overrides:
        updateProgress in class Task
        Parameters:
        workDone - The work done.
        totalWork - The total work.

      • setIndeterminate

        void setIndeterminate(boolean indeterminate)
        Set the indeterminate flag.
        Parameters:
        indeterminate - A boolean.
